set(BUILD_STATIC_LIBS true)

add_subdirectory("glew-cmake")
SET(GLEW_INCLUDE_DIRS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glew-cmake/include" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
SET(GLEW_LIBRARIES "libglew_static" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)

add_subdirectory("glfw")
SET(GLFW_INCLUDE_DIRS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glfw/include" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
SET(GLFW_LIBRARIES "glfw" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)

add_subdirectory("glm")
SET(GLM_INCLUDE_DIRS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/glm/glm" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
SET(GLM_LIBRARIES "glm_static" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)

add_subdirectory("spdlog")
SET(SPDLOG_INCLUDE_DIRS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/spdlog/include" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
SET(SPDLOG_LIBRARIES "spdlog" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)

SET(STB_INCLUDE_DIRS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/stb" CACHE STRING "" FORCE)

set(DEPS_INCLUDE_DIRS ${GLEW_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${GLFW_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${GLM_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${SPDLOG_INCLUDE_DIRS} ${STB_INCLUDE_DIRS} CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
set(DEPS_LIBRARIES ${GLEW_LIBRARIES} ${GLFW_LIBRARIES} ${GLM_LIBRARIES} ${SPDLOG_LIBRARIES} CACHE STRING "" FORCE)
